ocean.question: I’m big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water!
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🌊 I have waves.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm very slow.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You can find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have any bones!
💦 I can squirt ink.
✋ I have lots of arms to hug with.

ocean.question: I'm a fish with a star-like shape. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I live underwater
🖐️ I have five arms
✨ I look like something you'd wish on!

ocean.question: I am a big sea animal that makes a 'click' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very big!
🎶 I sing songs in the ocean.
🌊 I am a mammal, not a fish.

ocean.question: I have a fin on my back and rows of sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am known to be scary!
🌊 I swim very fast.
🐟 I eat other fish.

ocean.question: I drift in the ocean and sting if you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I jiggle like jelly.
🌊 I don't have bones.
🤕 Be careful when you swim near me!

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish that hides in rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I look a bit like a snake.
🕳️ I like to hide in holes.
🐠 I'm a fish, but a strange one.

ocean.question: I live in a shell and make shiny pearls. What am I?

hints.text: 🦪 I live at the bottom of the ocean.
💎 I create something very pretty.
🔒 My shell is hard.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in an anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 The anemone is my home.
🤡 I have bright colors.
🐠 I help keep my home clean

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 My color is like the sun.
🐒 A yummy treat for a monkey.
✨ I come in my own wrapper.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. Sometimes a worm lives in me! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My color is like fire trucks.
🌳 I hang from a tree.
🐛 Sometimes a little bug lives inside.

food.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 My color is like a pumpkin.
🐇 A furry animal loves to eat me.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

food.question: I am white and cold, and you eat me with a spoon. I am yummy for dessert! What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I am the same color as snow.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🍦 I am a very cold treat.

food.question: I am a small green ball that grows in a pod. You can eat me as a vegetable. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 My color is like grass.
🫛 I grow in a group inside a shell.
🌱 A small, round, green veggie.

food.question: I am made from milk and I am often yellow or white. You can eat me with crackers or in a sandwich! What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am a dairy product.
🥪 I can be eaten in sandwiches.
💛 I can be several colors including yellow.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from cows. I am white and good for your bones! What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal.
🥛 I am liquid and usually white.
🦴 I help you grow big and strong.

food.question: I am brown and creamy, and you spread me on bread. I am made from nuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am made from nuts.
🍞 People love to spread me on toast.
🥪 I am often used in sandwiches.

food.question: I am round and orange and grow in a garden. You can carve a face into me for Halloween! What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 People make me into scary faces for Halloween.
🧡 I am round and orange.
🌱 I grow in a garden.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven, and you can make sandwiches with me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am made from grain.
🔥 I am cooked in an oven.
🥪 You can put yummy things between slices of me.
